learningObjectives: See how peer-to-peer networks enable decentralized governance

insertions.rationale: Policy makers benefit from understanding technical constraints before governance mechanisms

steps.narrative: See how constitutional council members navigate complex governance decisions in practice.
learningObjectives: Apply constitutional principles to real scenarios

insertions.rationale: Concrete examples help solidify abstract governance concepts

annotations.content: Key insight: Constitutional governance is NOT about restricting freedom, but about protecting human dignity while enabling flourishing.
Connect this to Ostrom's work on commons governance - similar principles of subsidiarity and polycentric governance.
Consider how these principles could apply to municipal governance reform - start with a pilot in participatory budgeting.
